tags.documentation:
This is the XML defintion file used by the following scripts:
  • com.esarks.arm.model.MakeJeo.script

tag.name: jeo
tag.documentation: A container tag for the Jeo.

tag.name: name
tag.documentation: The name of the Jeo to be generated.

tag.name: field
tag.documentation: A container tag for the field.

tag.name: type
tag.documentation: The data type of the field.

tag.name: size
tag.documentation: The size of the field. (not currently used)

tag.name: nullable
tag.documentation: Identifies if the field can contain an null value. (not currently used)
